en: Are you sure you want to quit ?
Do you want to go back to level selection menu ?
Changes will only take place on restart, would you like to restart ?
in: Perubahan yang diminta membutuhkan mulai ulang permainan, mulai ulang permainan ?

en: Are you sure you want to load map from file ? (Unsaved map will be lost)
in: Muat peta sekarang ? (perubahan pada peta yang tidak disimpan akan hilang)

en: Are you sure you want to save map to file ?
Are you sure you want to play without saving the map ?
in: Mainkan peta tanpa menyimpan terlebih dahulu ?

en: Are you sure you want to leave preview mode ?
